title: Sona's ult
body: I feel like a good quality of life change for sona's kit would be to have her ult start behind her player model so that way you can land it on champs like xin xao, rengo, and other assassins for a chance of counter play against these champions. Instead of don't get close or hope your slow auto passive effect isn't the same range as their gap closer.  It would make the ult easier to land against heavy engage champs that land on top of her and give her chance to outplay these moments instead of feeling like the most hopeless squishy around or wasting ult in it's current state.

She lacks the power many other champions have of being the one who "wins" the game.  Her poke isn't strong enough to scare most champions unless you can land it repeatedly without counter damage.  Her heal/shield are very weak when you look at what they do individually (100% AP ratio sounds great until you have to tag all 5 champions on your team for it), her movement speed spell doesn't really last long enough (you can hit that thing like 4-7 times going from one base to the other and you still probably only saved yourself like 2-4 seconds); she lacks any internal form of engage disengage I.E. gap closer.  And her ult can't hit champions that are on top of her ({{champion:5}} , {{champion:107}} , etc...).

But most of all she is SUPER AP hungry.  While other utility champions like Soraka, or Janna can be played with limited AP and still have their abilities function as needed, high base heals with low cooldowns and strong disengage mechanics respectively, Sona doesn't really do all that much if you build her aura/defensive heavy and AP light.


She isn't "weak" per say, but a lot of her power comes from when your team is a full group and from your opponents playing poorly.  One of these means that you often don't see a power spike until 15-20 mins into the game.  The other is outside of your control.
